heading: Is Rice Vinegar gluten free?
intro: This public analysis report explains the biggest gluten risks in Rice Vinegar and how to order more safely.

verdict.summary: Rice vinegar is generally considered safe for individuals with coeliac disease as it is typically made from fermented rice and does not contain gluten. However, cross-contamination during processing can be a concern.

disclaimer: This guidance is informational only. Always verify ingredients and preparation with the restaurant.

sections.title: Quick answer
sections.body: Rice Vinegar can vary by recipe, ingredients, and cross-contact controls in the kitchen.

sections.title: Common gluten risks
sections.body: Watch for hidden sources like soy sauce, malt flavoring, marinades, thickeners, and shared fryers.
